QuestData.Title: Fields of Grief
QuestData.Description: What have we here? You look like a fledgling $c. If you hope to prove yourself to the Dark Lady, you need to learn the ways of the Forsaken.$b$bTo the west you'll find a farm. Humans infest the land like mold on a rotting corpse. And worse yet, the Scarlet Crusade patrols nearby from their tower. Teach those scum a lesson and steal 10 of their precious pumpkins.$b$bOnce you have 10, bring them back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal 10 pumpkins from the Solliden Farmstead in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to gather 10 pumpkins yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: You have performed your bidding well, young $c. You are proving yourself to be quite an asset to the Dark Lady's army.
